properties.displayName: COLSNA_CTE_Monitor Changes to Cloud Resource Hierarchy
properties.description:
Detects changes to resource groups, subscriptions, or management groups in Azure that may indicate malicious activity.
Platform:IAAS.MITRE:TA0005;T1666
properties.query:
//Desription:Detects changes to resource groups, subscriptions, or management groups in Azure that may indicate malicious activity.
//status:tested
//author:Danielle Torrence
AzureActivity
| where OperationNameValue has_any (
    "resourcegroups/write", 
    "resourcegroups/delete",
    "subscriptions/write", 
    "subscriptions/delete",
    "managementGroups/write", 
    "managementGroups/delete",
    "LeaveOrganization"
)
| extend Activity = case(
    OperationNameValue has "resourcegroups/write", "Resource Group Created",
    OperationNameValue has "resourcegroups/delete", "Resource Group Deleted",
    OperationNameValue has "subscriptions/write", "Subscription Created or Modified",
    OperationNameValue has "subscriptions/delete", "Subscription Deleted",
    OperationNameValue has "managementGroups/write", "Management Group Created or Modified",
    OperationNameValue has "managementGroups/delete", "Management Group Deleted",
    OperationNameValue has "LeaveOrganization", "Subscription Left Organization",
    "Unknown"
)
| project TimeGenerated, Caller, CallerIpAddress, OperationNameValue, Activity, ResourceGroup, ResourceId
